query.ejb-ql: SELECT OBJECT(o) FROM EBCollateral o WHERE o.sCISecurityID = ?1
SELECT OBJECT(o) FROM EBCollateralStaging o WHERE o.sCISecurityID = ?1
SELECT OBJECT(o) FROM EBCashDeposit o WHERE o.refID = ?1
SELECT OBJECT(o) FROM EBCashDepositStaging o WHERE o.refID = ?1
SELECT OBJECT(o) FROM EBFeeDetails o WHERE o.refID = ?1
SELECT OBJECT(o) FROM EBFeeDetailsStaging o WHERE o.refID = ?1
SELECT OBJECT(o) FROM EBPostDatedCheque o WHERE o.refID = ?1
SELECT OBJECT(o) FROM EBPostDatedChequeStaging o WHERE o.refID = ?1
SELECT OBJECT(o) FROM EBCDSItem o WHERE o.refID = ?1
SELECT OBJECT(o) FROM EBCDSItemStaging o WHERE o.refID = ?1
SELECT OBJECT(o) FROM EBMarketableEquity o WHERE o.refID = ?1
SELECT OBJECT(o) FROM EBMarketableEquityStaging o WHERE o.refID = ?1
SELECT OBJECT(o) FROM EBPledgor o WHERE o.sysGenPledgorID = ?1
SELECT OBJECT(o) FROM EBPledgor o WHERE o.legalID = ?1 AND o.pledgorStatus NOT IN ('D')
SELECT OBJECT(o) FROM EBPledgorStaging o WHERE o.sysGenPledgorID = ?1
SELECT OBJECT(o) FROM EBPledgorStaging o WHERE o.legalID = ?1 AND o.pledgorStatus NOT IN ('D')
SELECT OBJECT(o) FROM EBPledgorCreditGrade o WHERE o.pledgorID = ?1
SELECT OBJECT(o) FROM EBCollateralSubType o WHERE o.typeCode = ?1
SELECT OBJECT(o) FROM EBCollateralSubType o
SELECT OBJECT(o) FROM EBCollateralSubType o WHERE o.groupID = ?1 ORDERBY o.subTypeCode
SELECT OBJECT(o) FROM EBCollateralSubTypeStaging o WHERE o.typeCode = ?1
SELECT OBJECT(o) FROM EBCollateralSubTypeStaging o
SELECT OBJECT(o) FROM EBCollateralSubTypeStaging o WHERE o.groupID = ?1 ORDERBY o.subTypeCode
SELECT OBJECT(o) FROM EBCollateralParameter o WHERE o.groupId = ?1
SELECT OBJECT(o) FROM EBCollateralParameter o WHERE o.countryIsoCode = ?1 and o.securitySubTypeId = ?2
SELECT OBJECT(o) FROM EBCollateralParameterStaging o WHERE o.groupId = ?1
SELECT OBJECT(o) FROM EBCollateralParameterStaging o WHERE o.countryIsoCode = ?1 and o.securitySubTypeId = ?2
SELECT OBJECT(o) FROM EBCollateralLimitMap o WHERE o.eBCollateralID = ?1 AND o.eBLimitID = ?2
SELECT OBJECT(o) FROM EBCollateralLimitMap o WHERE o.eBCollateralID = ?1 AND o.eBCoBorrowerLimitID = ?2
SELECT OBJECT(o) FROM EBCollateralLimitMap o WHERE o.eBCollateralID = ?1
SELECT OBJECT(o) FROM EBCollateralLimitMapStaging o WHERE o.eBCollateralID = ?1 AND o.eBLimitID = ?2
SELECT OBJECT(o) FROM EBCollateralLimitMapStaging o WHERE o.eBCollateralID = ?1 AND o.eBCoBorrowerLimitID = ?2
SELECT OBJECT(o) FROM EBCollateralLimitMapStaging o WHERE o.eBCollateralID = ?1
SELECT OBJECT(o) FROM EBCMDSubLimit o
SELECT OBJECT(o) FROM EBCMDSubLimitStaging o
SELECT OBJECT(o) FROM EBLimitCharge o WHERE o.refID = ?1 and o.eBCollateralID = ?2
SELECT OBJECT(o) FROM EBLimitChargeStaging o WHERE o.refID = ?1 and o.eBCollateralID = ?2
SELECT OBJECT(o) FROM EBInstrumentBean o WHERE (?1 = o.eBCollateralID)
SELECT OBJECT(o) FROM EBInstrumentStageBean o WHERE (?1 = o.eBCollateralID)
SELECT OBJECT(o) FROM EBShareSecurity o WHERE (?1 = o.eBCollateralId AND o.status <> 'D')
SELECT OBJECT(o) FROM EBShareSecurity o WHERE (?1 = o.eBCollateralId AND ?2 = o.sourceId AND o.status <> 'D')
SELECT OBJECT(o) FROM EBShareSecurity o WHERE (?1 = o.sourceSecurityId AND ?2 = o.sourceId AND o.status <> 'D')
SELECT OBJECT(o) FROM EBCollateralAssetLife o
SELECT OBJECT(o) FROM EBCollateralAssetLife o WHERE o.groupID = ?1 ORDERBY o.subTypeCode
SELECT OBJECT(o) FROM EBCollateralAssetLifeStaging o
SELECT OBJECT(o) FROM EBCollateralAssetLifeStaging o WHERE o.groupID = ?1 ORDERBY o.subTypeCode
SELECT OBJECT(o) FROM EBMFChecklist o WHERE o.eBCollateralID = ?1
SELECT OBJECT(o) FROM EBMFChecklistStaging o WHERE o.eBCollateralID = ?1
